mcq.statement: Who was commissioned by Hajjaj bin Yousaf to lead the expedition after the initial failures?
mcq.one_liner: After the initial failures, Hajjaj bin Yousaf commissioned his son-in-law, **Imad-ud-Din Muhammad bin Qasim**, to lead the expedition.

suggestions.topic: Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
